txt.en: Fuirion lies in a pool of blood, breathing slowly. He is not dead, but it is clear that he does not have much time....
Try to rescue Fuirion from Hebil and the Corsairs
Hebil is in the Corsair encampment in northern Lamedon.\n\nYou should speak with Hebil.
'This one has a death wish, you know. Are you sure you want to save him? He made good sport for my men. Not very worth rescuing, if you ask me.'
Fuirion lies even more grievously wounded at Hebil's feet. If he is to be rescued, it must be done soon, but Hebil stands in the way.
Gladion and Limril are at their home in Dínadab.\n\nYou should speak with Limril.
A Life Hangs on a Thread

'I am grateful that you were able to bring Gladion back to me alive, but... I do not know how we will be whole without Fuirion. I keep expecting him to come through the door, bringing a leg of lamb for my stew, or a special coin for Túmir. I still fancy that I can hear the sound of his voice as he reads to Míreth.\n\n'He threw his life away, and my heart whispers that it was because of me.'
